## Description {#details}

Represents the counter values to wait for in an s&#95;waitcnt instruction.

Large values (including the maximum possible integer) can be used to represent &quot;don&#39;t care&quot; waits.

Definition at line 967 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/utils/amdgpubaseinfo-h">AMDGPUBaseInfo.h</a>.
